name: Huawei nova 15 Ultra
highlights:
Exp. release 2026, January 06
209g, 6.8mm thickness
HarmonyOS 6.0
256GB/512GB/1TB storage, no card slot

BODY.Build: Glass front (Kunlun Glass), aluminum alloy frame, fiber-reinforced plastic back
BODY: IP68/IP69 dust tight and water resistant (high pressure water jets; immersible up to 2m for 30 min)

DISPLAY.Type: LTPO OLED, 1B colors, HDR Vivid, 120Hz, 2160Hz PWM, 4000 nits (peak)

MAIN CAMERA.Triple:
50 MP, f/1.4-4.0, 24mm (wide), PDAF, OIS
50 MP, f/2.2, 88mm (periscope telephoto), PDAF, OIS, 3.7x optical zoom
50 MP, f/2.2, 13mm, 118Ëš (ultrawide), AF
MAIN CAMERA.Features: Laser AF, color spectrum sensor, Dual-LED flash, panorama, HDR

COMMS.Bluetooth: 6.0, A2DP, LE, L2HC (320-960 kbps HD audio)
COMMS.Positioning: GPS (L1+L5), GLONASS (L1), BDS (B1I+B1c+B2a+B2b), GALILEO (E1+E5a+E5b), QZSS (L1+L5), NavIC

FEATURES.Sensors: Fingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, gyro, compass
FEATURES:
Virtual proximity sensing
BDS Satellite Calling and Messaging - China only

BATTERY.Charging:
100W wired, SCP, UFCS, PD, PPS, QC
50W wireless
7.5W reverse wireless
5W reverse wired
